segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 1
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 1

segments.pli: 4. Adantavagga
segments.en: 4. Wild

segments.pli: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ adantaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not tamed, is so very harmful as the mind.

segments.pli: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, adantaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
segments.en: A wild mind is very harmful.”

segments.pli: Paṭhamaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ dantaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is tamed, is so very beneficial as the mind.

segments.pli: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, dantaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
segments.en: A tamed mind is very beneficial.”

segments.pli: Dutiyaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ aguttaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not guarded, is so very harmful as the mind.

segments.pli: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, aguttaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
segments.en: An unguarded mind is very harmful.”

segments.pli: Tatiyaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ guttaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is guarded, is so very beneficial as the mind.

segments.pli: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, guttaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
segments.en: A guarded mind is very beneficial.”

segments.pli: Catutthaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ arakkhitaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not protected, is so very harmful as the mind.

segments.pli: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, arakkhitaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
segments.en: An unprotected mind is very harmful.”

segments.pli: Pañcamaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ rakkhitaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is protected, is so very beneficial as the mind.

segments.pli: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, rakkhitaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
segments.en: A protected mind is very beneficial.”

segments.pli: Chaṭṭhaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ asaṃvutaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it’s not restrained, is so very harmful as the mind.

segments.pli: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, asaṃvutaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
segments.en: An unrestrained mind is very harmful.”

segments.pli: Sattamaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ saṃvutaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is restrained, is so very beneficial as the mind.

segments.pli: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃvutaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
segments.en: A restrained mind is very beneficial.”

segments.pli: Aṭṭhamaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ adantaṃ aguttaṃ arakkhitaṃ asaṃvutaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is not tamed, guarded, protected, and restrained, is so very harmful as the mind.

segments.pli: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, adantaṃ aguttaṃ arakkhitaṃ asaṃvutaṃ mahato anatthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
segments.en: An untamed, unguarded, unprotected, and unrestrained mind is very harmful.”

segments.pli: Navamaṃ.
“Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ dantaṃ guttaṃ rakkhitaṃ saṃvutaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattati yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that, when it is tamed, guarded, protected, and restrained, is so very beneficial as the mind.

segments.pli: Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, dantaṃ guttaṃ rakkhitaṃ saṃvutaṃ mahato atthāya saṃvattatī”ti.
segments.en: A tamed, guarded, protected, and restrained mind is very beneficial.”

segments.pli: Dasamaṃ.
Adantavaggo catuttho.
